User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I log in to surf a Manual surfing site, the countdown timer starts counting down, if I change tab to another site the timer stops until I return to tab with the timer countdown.


Actual results:

It stops and continues when i am back on the surf page, it should continue counting down when not in the same tab or window. Surfing several of these types of sites at the same time was never a problems until version 5 or 6 of FF.  Something is wrong.


Expected results:

The timer should continue counting down and when it reaches 0 you click an image then it presents a new page and the countdown starts over again. This happens correctly in IE, but from versions of FF 5+ it stopped working correctly.
